entry.title: Atom 0.3 snapshot
entry.summary: The Atom 0.3 snapshot is out. Here are some sample feeds.

div.p: The Atom 0.3 snapshot is out. Changes from the 0.2 snapshot:

ol.li: MAY contain feed/info. Free-form info statement that describes the feed format. More explanation of info.
Expanded link syntax. All links now include rel, type, and href attributes.

Expanded content model. feed/title, feed/tagline, feed/info, feed/copyright, entry/title, and entry/summary can now contain arbitrary data (such as HTML). You must specify the data type in the type attribute, and (for non-XML formats) the escaping mode in the mode attribute.
feed/generator now has url and version attributes. The child text is now the human-readable toolkit name.
several other changes not listed here
